00040                            boost::shared_ptr<AbstractStimulusFunction> pIntracellularStimulus)

00071 template<>
00072 void OdeSystemInformation<FakeBathCell>::Initialise(void)
00073 {
00074     // State variables
00075     this->mVariableNames.push_back("Fake voltage");
00076     this->mVariableUnits.push_back("mV");
00077     this->mInitialConditions.push_back(0.0);
00078 
00079     this->mInitialised = true;
00080 }
